content:
https://discourse.nixos.org/t/nix-2-27-0-released/62003

if i have heard it correctly then flakes are stable now.
What is the favourite part of this release for you all?

I have got a few pings regarding the confirmation from some other sources.
just to be clear

if i have heard it correctly then flakes are stable now.

above line is a part of April's Fool Joke.

I fell for this April's Fools joke </3
I even shared it with some ex-colleagues!
